name: uncom

body.origin:
|- wceq(cun(c0, c1), cun(c1, c0))
-| wb(wo(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cun(c1, c0)))
-| diffsc(hs0, c0)
-| diffsc(hs0, c1)
-| diffsc(hs0, cun(c1, c0))

|- wceq(cun(c0, c1), cun(c1, c0))

-| diffsc(hs0, c0)
-| diffsc(hs0, c1)
-| diffsc(hs0, cun(c1, c0))

stmt.origin: bitr4i(wo(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cun(c1, c0)), wo(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
stmt.pretty: bitr4i((hs0 ∈ c0 ∨ hs0 ∈ c1), hs0 ∈(c1 ⋃ c0), (hs0 ∈ c1 ∨ hs0 ∈ c0))

comment: Commutative law for union of classes. Exercise 6 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 17. (Contributed by NM, 25-Jun-1998.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 26-Jun-2011.)
